description: This file defines a layout component for a Qwik framework-based web application. It imports components and styles, sets up request caching logic, defines a server-side data loader, and renders the layout with header, footer, and main content areas.

methods.name: onGet
methods.description: Handles HTTP GET requests, setting cache control headers for performance optimization and costs reduction.

methods.name: useServerTimeLoader
methods.description: A route data loader that provides the current server time as ISO string.
